title: My Temp Ban
body: I got banned late wednesday the 13th or early thursday the 14th and when I checked on it this morning it still says I can play in 14 days can an admin or support help me figure out if this is a bug or if it keeps changing everytime I cehck on it intentionally

replies.body: I don't believe that message is programmed to countdown whatsoever. I did check though, and your ban is set to expire on the 23rd!
Good looks man thank you. First time since season 1 I have ever been banned so I was blind on this. Thanks man
